code: import AsyncStorage from"react-native-web/dist/exports/AsyncStorage";export var loadState=function loadState(){try{var serializedState=localStorage.getItem('state');if(serializedState===null){return undefined;}return JSON.parse(serializedState);}catch(err){return undefined;}};export var saveState=function saveState(state){try{var serializedState=JSON.stringify(state);AsyncStorage.setItem('state',serializedState);}catch(err){console.log(err);}};
